description: This detection excludes known namped pipes accessible remotely and notify on newly observed ones, may help to detect lateral movement and remote exec using named pipes Author: Samir Bousseaden. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: update the excluded named pipe to filter out any newly observed legit named pipe
name: First Time Seen Remote Named Pipe
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\*\\IPC$) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:("atsvc" OR "samr" OR "lsarpc" OR "lsass" OR "winreg" OR "netlogon" OR "srvsvc" OR "protected_storage" OR "wkssvc" OR "browser" OR "netdfs" OR "svcctl" OR "spoolss" OR "ntsvcs" OR "LSM_API_service" OR "HydraLsPipe" OR "TermSrv_API_service" OR "MsFteWds" OR "sql\\query"))))
